skills.name: Spirit Whisper
skills.desc: Has a high chance of Dominating a single target and Advancing their action forward to immediately attack a random ally of theirs.

skills.name: Midnight Tumult
skills.desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

skills.name: Caressing Moonlight
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. If the target is Shocked, inflicts Shock on the adjacent units.

skills.name: Silent and Sharp Mockery
skills.desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Tremble
skills.desc: If the target is currently Shocked, directly causes Shock DMG 1 time.

skills.name: Cruelty
skills.desc: When friendly units (apart from Kafka) or Dominated targets deal DMG to Shocked targets, unleash an extra Lightning ATK. This can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

skills.name: Spirit Whisper
skills.desc: Has a high chance of Dominating a single target and Advancing their action forward to immediately attack a random ally of theirs.

skills.name: Psychological Suggestion
skills.desc: Applies Psychological Suggestion to multiple targets, and adds Revelation onto the action bar. The next time Revelation takes action, any targets with Psychological Suggestion will become Dominated.

skills.name: Midnight Tumult
skills.desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

skills.name: Caressing Moonlight
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. If the target is Shocked, inflicts Shock on the adjacent units.

skills.name: Silent and Sharp Mockery
skills.desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Seething Whisper of the Fallen
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target. At the same time, deals Lightning DMG to all other Shocked targets.

skills.name: Tremble
skills.desc: If the target is currently Shocked, directly cause Shock DMG 1 time.

skills.name: Cruelty
skills.desc: When friendly units (apart from Kafka) or Dominated targets deal DMG to Shocked targets, unleash an extra Lightning ATK.

skills.name: Griever
skills.desc: Every time a target triggers the Shock state, DMG dealt by Kafka slightly increases.
